name: Download Theme | Plugin | WC products zip from dashboard
author: wp-master.ir

sections.changelog:
0.7

  • small update

0.6

  • Add another method to zip

0.5

  • Now you can download themes from dashboard

0.4

  • Now you can download plugins from dashboard

0.3

  • added download box to product edit page
  • some bugs fix

0.2

  • MultiLinks also is supported now
  • links in admin comes with its name

0.1

  • ver 0.1 released.
sections.description:
download themes | plugins and products from dashboard as Zip file

sometime you need to get your plugins or downloadable products , and you don’t have host panel access in that time,now there is no need to going to hosting panel and get missed files , with this plugin you can download WooCommerce downloadable products from WordPress dashboard , just click on Dll button next to products lists
